name: Apple Pie
overview: Apple Pie was developed by Tim Chown and published for the BBC Microcomputer by Visions in 1984. It is a single screen action game where the player controls a tank and has to kill invading aliens. The setting is an American village which is being attacked by waves of aliens who attempt to steal the stars of the national flag. The game is played in a grid-like maze which is viewed from a top down perspective.
